room_title: Escape room "Dr. Madd Steals Christmas" by Sly Fox Escapes in Colorado Springs
room_address: 5360 N Academy Blvd. Ste 160 Colorado Springs, CO 80918
room_description: Dr. Evelyn Madd is up to her evil tricks once again. This time she has deactivated the Naughty/Nice Detector from the North Pole. Only a special dose of Christmas Magic can save the day. Will you be able to find the Christmas Magic reactivate the machine and save Christmas? Succeed and the children of the world will thank you, fail and all the villains of the world will have a very merry Christmas!
